name: Happyville (itch) (BeanSprot)
description:
In the prototype stage

Happyville is a tile-based game. There is no objective yet. It is very, very early into development.

Each map is randomly generated. This means that every object in the game is randomly placed every time the game loads.

Instructions on how to run and play the game are included with the download, in _README.txt.

I want Happyville to be the most absurd, random and illogical game I have ever played.
